bibl.title: Some Byzantine Papyri from the British Library.
Studies in Memory of Zbigniew Borkowski
bibl.author: SIJPESTEIJN, Pieter J.

bibl.note: 1. P. Lond. III, 1017. Lease of land. Hermopolis, VIth cent. A.D. - 2. P. Lond. III, 1031. List of payments. Provenance unknown, VIth/VIIth cent. A.D. - 3. P. Lond. II, 446. List of names. Provenance unknown, VIth cent. A.D. - 4. P. Lond. III, 875a. Receipt of barley. Oxyrhynchite Nome, VIth cent. A.D. - 5. P. Lond. III, 1311. Request to the protokometai of Ibion Chyseos. Oxyrhynchite Nome, VIth/VIIth cent. A.D.
bibl.seg: SIJPESTEIJN Pieter J., Some Byzantine Papyri from the British Library.
Studies in Memory of Zbigniew Borkowski = JJurP 23 (1993) pp. 137-143.
